name: Launch (DevIsMutantLol)
description:
Control the goo as the arrow rotates and press space to jump in the direction of the arrow..

If you miss out any platform use Return to start rewind and stop it to land on 'hard to land platforms'.

  • Controls : 
    • Press space to jump.
    • Press and Hold Return / Enter key to start the rewinding.
    • Leave the return / Enter key to end the rewind.
  • Remember: Rewind needs diamonds which are limited in amount. Moreover jumps per level is also fixed. Use the combination of jumps and rewind to complete the levels.
  • Credits :
    • LolHank
    • SuperMutantHero
    • MegaQuilawa
  • Special Thanks : 
    • You for playing :)
